item.title: mqtt
item.author: shiya6900@126.com
item.description: 与其他协议的区别 xmpp等 协议格式 https://mcxiaoke.gitbooks.io/mqtt-cn/content/ 应用 java based broker： https://github.com/andsel/moquette netty中支持mqtt的编解码handler: https://netty.io/4.1/api/io/netty/handler/codec/mqtt/package-summary.html
